user_login: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.password, u.location, u.battery, u.KM, u.membership, a.ident, a.latitude_deg, a.longitude_deg FROM users u JOIN airport a ON u.location = a.ident WHERE u.username = %s
register: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, location, battery) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
update_user_location: UPDATE users SET battery = GREATEST(battery * 0.75, 0), location = %s WHERE id = %s
update_user_battery: UPDATE users SET battery = 100 WHERE id = %s
get_user_km: SELECT KM FROM users WHERE id = %s
update_user_km: UPDATE users SET KM = %s WHERE id = %s
update_user_membership: UPDATE users SET membership = %s WHERE id = %s
get_all_airports: SELECT ident, name, municipality, iso_country FROM airport ORDER BY name LIMIT 20 OFFSET %s
get_airports_code: SELECT ident, name FROM airport WHERE iso_country = %s ORDER BY name
